```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


#Load libraries
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
```

#Read in crab and shoot density data
```{r}
crab <- read.csv("clean_crab_otter_size_data_all_years.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, na.strings=c("","NA")) #eventually source from KNB

shoot <- read.csv("shoot_density.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, na.strings=c("","NA")) #eventually source from KNB

bio <- read.csv("seagrass_biomass.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, na.strings=c("","NA")) #eventually source from KNB
```

#Clean up "shoot" df, calculate m2 shoot-density, and join with size data
```{r}
#clean up shoot df
shoot <-
  shoot %>% 
  rename(year = Ã¯..year) %>% 
  mutate(eg_shoot_msq = shoot_dens*4)

#Clean up sg biomass df
bio <-
  bio %>% 
  dplyr::select(-c("X", "site_2019", "bay_code", "X.1", "X.2", "X.3"))

#Join data
crab <- left_join(crab, shoot, by= "sec_key")
crab <- left_join(crab, bio, by= "sec_key")

crab <-
  crab %>% 
  dplyr::select(-c("bay_code.y", "bay_code.x", "sex", "shoot_dens", "shoot_dens_se")) %>% 
  rename(eg_mass_msq = avg_biom_msq)
```

#Fill in year column
```{r}
crab$year<- NA
crab$year[1:120] <- 2020
crab$year[121:381] <- 2017
crab$year[382:490] <- 2018
crab$year[491:754] <- 2019
```

#Remove NAs from where there is no shoot density data
```{r}
crab <- crab[!is.na(crab$eg_mass_msq), ]
crab <- crab[!is.na(crab$eg_shoot_msq), ]
```

#Filter for species 
```{r}
crab_dun <-
  crab %>% 
  filter(SpCode %in% c("CRABDUN"))

crab_gra <-
  crab %>% 
  filter(SpCode %in% c("CRABGRA"))

crab_red <-
  crab %>% 
  filter(SpCode %in% c("CRABRR"))

crab_hel <-
  crab %>% 
  filter(SpCode %in% c("CRABHEL"))
```

#Filter for correct years for C. magister and M. gracilis
```{r}
crab_dun <-
  crab_dun %>% 
  filter(year %in% c("2019", "2020"))

crab_gra <-
  crab_gra %>% 
  filter(year %in% c("2019", "2020"))
```

#Data analysis
#C. magister
```{r}
#Run GLMs
dun1 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ otter_density + eg_shoot_msq + eg_mass_msq, data = crab_dun, family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun1)

dun2 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ otter_density  + eg_mass_msq, data = crab_dun, family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun2)

dun3 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ otter_density + eg_shoot_msq, data = crab_dun,  family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun3)

dun4 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ eg_shoot_msq + eg_mass_msq, data = crab_dun,  family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun4)

dun5 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ otter_density, data = crab_dun, family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun5)

dun6 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ eg_shoot_msq, data = crab_dun, family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun6)

dun7 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ eg_mass_msq, data = crab_dun,  family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun7)

dun8 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ otter_density*eg_shoot_msq, data = crab_dun,  family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun8)

dun9 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ otter_density*eg_mass_msq, data = crab_dun,  family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun9)

dun10 <- glm(carapace_width_mm ~ eg_shoot_msq*eg_mass_msq, data = crab_dun,  family = gaussian(link = "log"))
summary(dun10)

#Create list of models
dun_models <- list(dun1,dun2,dun3,dun4,dun5,dun6,dun7,dun8,dun9)
names(dun_models) <- c("~sea otter density + shoot density + seagrass biomass", "~sea otter_density + seagrass biomass", "~sea otter density + shoot density", "~shoot density + seagrass biomass", "~sea otter density", "~shoot density", "~seagrass biomass", "~sea otter density*shoot density", "~sea otter density*seagrass biomass" )
#Calculate AICc
library(MuMIn)
AICc(dun1);AICc(dun2);AICc(dun3);AICc(dun4);AICc(dun5);AICc(dun6);AICc(dun7);AICc(dun8);AICc(dun9)
#Calculate delta-AIC, and AIC weights
library(AICcmodavg)
aictab(dun_models, modnames = names(dun_models),
second.ord = TRUE, nobs = NULL, sort = TRUE)
```

#Visreg plots for all species and predictor variables
```{r}
#visreg dung
fig.dun1 <- visreg(dun9, "otter_density", band= TRUE, scale = "response", gg = TRUE, rug=FALSE)+
   geom_point(data = crab_dun, aes(otter_density, carapace_width_mm))+
   theme_classic()+
  labs(x= expression(Sea~otter~density~(ind.~km^-2)), y= "Crab size", title=expression("A)"))+
 theme(text = element_text(size=20), axis.title.y = element_blank(), axis.title.x = element_blank())+
  ylim(0,200)+
  xlim(0,30)

   theme_classic()+

  theme(text = element_text(size=20), axis.title.y = element_blank())+
  ylim(0,200)

fake.fig <- visreg(red10, "eg_shoot_msq", band= TRUE, scale="response", gg = TRUE, rug=FALSE)+
   geom_point(data = crab_hel, aes(eg_shoot_msq, carapace_width_mm))+
   theme_classic()+
  labs(x= expression(Seagrass~biomass~(g.~m^-2)), y= "Crab size", title=expression("F)"))+
  theme(text = element_text(size=20), axis.title.y = element_blank())+
  ylim(0,200)


```

#arrange visreg plots
```{r}
vis.dun <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(fig.dun1, fig.dun2, ncol=3, nrow = 1)
vis.gra <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(fig.gra1,fig.gra2, ncol=3, nrow = 1)
vis.red <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(fig.red1,fig.red2,fig.red3, ncol=3, nrow = 1)
vis.hel <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(fig.hel1, fake.fig,fig.hel2, ncol=3, nrow = 1)

vis.all <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(vis.dun, vis.gra, vis.red, vis.hel, ncol=1, nrow = 4)

vis.all1 <- annotate_figure(vis.all, left = text_grob("Crab carapace width (mm)", rot=90, size = 20))
vis.all1
```
